products.title: Day & Night Flecked Grey
products.metadescription: Day & night flecked grey
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Origin, Cream - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, cream - day night blind the ultimate neutral, the origin's cream is light, airy, and versatile in colour, and sleek and shapely in form. The smooth threads are tightly woven to create a sturdy yet lightweight fabric, and the sliding netting is sim
products.productdescription: The ultimate neutral, the origin's cream is light, airy, and versatile in colour, and sleek and shapely in form. The smooth threads are tightly woven to create a sturdy yet lightweight fabric, and the sliding netting is simple and translucent.Meld the cream with peach and coral tones for an unconventional, yet cheerful and pretty, look in the family bathroom. Choose white walls and peach or coral tiling, accessorising with matching towels, wall art, and trinkets. Go for bleached white floorboards for a lovely vintage touch.

products.title: Origin, Pewter - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, pewter - day night blind the fabric of the slate grey origin pewter is sleek and modern, allowing for a clean and streamlined look and easy workability. The controls and brackets are tucked neatly into the overhead rail cassette, affording the bli
products.productdescription: The fabric of the slate grey origin pewter is sleek and modern, allowing for a clean and streamlined look and easy workability. The controls and brackets are tucked neatly into the overhead rail cassette, affording the blind extra tidiness and attractiveness. Place the pewter against pure white walls in the living room and add matching grey throws and cushions throughout the room. Choose a bright shade, such as zesty lime, funky satsuma, or cobalt blue, to add bursts of colour throughout the room.

products.title: Origin, White - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, white - day night blind using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on y
products.productdescription: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs.Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

products.title: Origin, Dark Brown - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, dark brown - day night blind in dark, grey-toned brown, the origin in dark brown is a deep yet neutral blind that will match a range of dcor schemes, colour palettes, and woods. With movable strips for light and privacy, hidden controls and brack
products.productdescription: In dark, grey-toned brown, the origin in dark brown is a deep yet neutral blind that will match a range of dcor schemes, colour palettes, and woods. With movable strips for light and privacy, hidden controls and brackets, and a sleek and impactful design, this blind is the height of luxury.Use the dark brown as part of a neutral colour scheme, surrounding it with white, cream, or ivory walls and furniture and accessories in cocoas, mochas, and taupes. Provide plenty of warm, cosy fabrics for luxe and comfort.

products.title: Origin, Taupe Grey - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, taupe grey - day night blind in a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to al
products.productdescription: In a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to allow more or less light into the room.Create an industrial look in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the taupe grey amidst cobalt blue or slate grey walls, perhaps including a brick-look wallpaper for a fun effect. Include steel and wire furnishings, adding warmth with antique-style wools and heavy linens.

products.title: Origin, Medium Grey - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, medium grey - day night blind a contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the r
products.productdescription: A contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the room whilst still retaining privacy.Use the medium grey as part of a strong, moody dcor scheme in an older child's bedroom, framing it with stark white or pale grey walls. Add distinctive metallic furniture, in materials such as steel and wire, to add a real sense of style to the room. Provide colour with quick pops of petrol blue.

products.title: Origin, Black - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Shop their range of zebra roller blinds with fast delivery & free samples. The best blinds at the best prices guaranteed, 98% of customers agree.
products.productdescription: In sleek ebony, the origin in black is flawlessly chic. The blind comprises of a smooth, contemporary double layering of jet black fabric, which hosts a sliding strip of black striped netting, and an overhead rail cassette containing the controls and brackets.Fuse the black with a sunny yellow for a cool and fashionable look in a teenager's bedroom. Stick to a base of pure white walls, and use a mixture of black and lemon for the bedlinen, wall hangings, and ornaments. Don't be afraid to add a bold pattern or two, in matching tones, to the mix!

products.title: Origin, Brown - Day Night Blind

Choose dark, polished furniture to complement the look, and accent with plush fabrics, such as thick wools and smooth chenilles, for warmth and charm.

Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. With different shades flowing effortlessly into one another cream allows you to see something different every time you look at it.Give your living room a modern take on the country style of decor by pairing natura cream with stone grey items such as a rug in front of the fire or a selection of scatter cushions on the sofa. To go that little bit more rustic add touches of copper or brass around the fire or mantel piece.

products.productdescription: Natura mist combines a lightweight and elegant voile and a richly detailed fabric that immerses your senses to create a modern addition that adds to any home. With a level of craftsmanship and care that is unrivalled, the mist fabric is integrated with the voile panels so that you have complete control of the light in your home. A unique blend of the aesthetic and functional worlds.Mist captures the imagination by taking your eye on a journey through a whole spectrum of colours and tones. Match the finely woven colour transitions with the intrinsic beauty of a wood floor or lightly stained kitchen worktop as you make a feature of the fine details.

products.productdescription: Bayham astra brings a subtle touch to your decor by combining functionality with a homely calming colour that instantly makes you feel at peace. The elegantly hanging voile supports gentle strips of colour that you can manipulate with ease to make sure you have the perfect ambience for the occasion.Cream leather seating and off-white walls allow you to add calming colours that will allow your living room to be the restful place the whole family enjoy spending time in at the end of the day. A jar of fairy lights and some selectively placed tea lights also make for great additions when the sun goes down.
